  group_names:
    - "PLACEHOLDER_1"
    - "PLACEHOLDER_2"
  number_participants: 32

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
library(gt)
persons_per_group <- ceiling(params$number_participants / length(params$group_names))
strips_per_day <- matrix(rep(params$group_names, times = persons_per_group),
  ncol = persons_per_group
)
# Strips for each day (3 total)
rbind(
  strips_per_day,
  strips_per_day,
  strips_per_day
) |>
  as.data.frame() |>
  gt() |>
  tab_style(
    style = cell_borders(color = "black"),
    locations = cells_body()
  ) |>
  cols_label(V1 = "", V2 = "", V3 = "") |>
  tab_options(column_labels.hidden = TRUE)
```
